title: What is the origin of the term 'jarhead'? - Quora
tags: Etymology of English Phrases (Origin or History of English Phrases)

response.answer_text: The term refers to members of the United States Marine Corps. If people outside the Corps use the term, it could be considered derogatory.  Marines cut their hair in a particular style that is referred to as "high and tight." The result is a head that looks like a jar; hence, "jarhead."
